questions.question: What does the Fox’s task suggest about fairness?
options: A neutral start line keeps the race orderly
He is secretly helping the Hare
He wants to stop the event

questions.question: How do the racers’ mindsets contrast right before the signal?
How does collective anticipation shape the start?
options: The silent crowd builds tension for the first step
Noise from the crowd distracts the racers
No one pays attention to the moment
